Exploitation
Discrimination
Violence

... Just a few of the risks faced by migrant workers. They must be treated fairly. It's in everyone’s interest. https://t.co/CswAOztiF5

#SocialJusticeDay https://t.co/DwVP8TYIlC

Starting now: UN Security Council meeting on the situation in the Middle East, including the Palestinian question.

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf
Women’s access to leadership positions at all levels is 🔑 to achieving gender equality. Where does your country rank on the Women in Politics map? ➡️ https://t.co/bFHleN9bsC https://t.co/RdNModgi3D

Social Justice is the foundation for peace, but it can only be achieved if no one is left behind.
Migrants are no exception. https://t.co/CswAOztiF5 #SocialJusticeDay https://t.co/RqnfN8scT8
Countries are working together on a new Global Compact for safe, orderly & regular migration that benefits everyone. Find out more here: https://t.co/LYzXqU2FpK https://t.co/0bvahWibzR

Social justice is possible when we remove barriers based on gender, race, ethnicity, religion, culture or disability. Find out more on Tuesday's #SocialJusticeDay https://t.co/S3W8mC5kFB https://t.co/2Acnqn3n5l
For the 1st time, food was delivered by boat 🛥 in Upper Nile, South Sudan, thanks to our colleagues from @UNMISSmedia & @WFP: https://t.co/g0slqo3ZHR #ServingForPeace https://t.co/cY6FONHgnm

"The Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban-Treaty stabilized the arms race." -- @SinaZerbo receiving Award for Science Diplomacy for his work with @CTBTO_alerts https://t.co/PjZo23GpH1 https://t.co/3dQpyk0V3S
Nearly 6M people have been displaced in Iraq. They want to return home. @UNDPinIraq is helping #RebuildIraq after 3 years of ISIL.             https://t.co/pHzPo5qKbQ
Continues this week in New York: Commission on the Limits of the Continental Shelf (through 16 March): https://t.co/k0OjzmXpxy
Continues this week in Geneva: Conference on Disarmament [through 30 Mar]: https://t.co/oMxVBFjO9n https://t.co/kik75IafOC

Who does climate change affect? Everyone.
Who can take climate action? Anyone.
Here's how: https://t.co/roJjv8h4Kq #GlobalGoals https://t.co/dZbZKKmeb8
Starts this week in Geneva: Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women [19 Feb - 9 Mar]: https://t.co/TXPstDRlMS https://t.co/gRb9wQjtis
What's happening this week at the UN? #SocialJusticeDay, Mother Language Day & much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/U76dONw7SD https://t.co/NPdLm8P9uk

Stop - Prevent - Protect

Here is how the UN is working to make zero tolerance for sexual exploitation & abuse a reality: https://t.co/G3A62cmaC8 https://t.co/AyZCy5Gqao
It's #LunarNewYear of the Dog and we want to thank all our K-9 colleagues 🐶 & their handlers for keeping us safe all year round! https://t.co/CIKB1AHFtd
Looking to make a difference to the 🌎 but don't know how? Here are some #SustainableSunday ideas: https://t.co/uE8W7SyBk4 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/V0MQkjDFmq
UN Peacekeepers from Nigeria work in harsh conditions to protect others. Thank you, Nigeria, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/ZiUtMaS9gz
On last week's #ValentinesDay, @UNFPA asked everyone to help girls say #IDONT to child marriage. Here's how: https://t.co/fGaEtkbbGg https://t.co/pDRGiCpwAo

Thanks @XiamenAirlines for spreading the word through your in-flight entertainment about UN peacekeepers who are #ServingForPeace.

But you don't need to be on a plane to learn more ➡️ https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/snzIdKYBPq
Here's how WFP school meals change children's lives 👉 https://t.co/Ri4U6jXPFp https://t.co/UxpYWbL5Su
This @Refugees project empowers refugees with disabilities through sports and restores hope for a better future. https://t.co/iE9E0fiExe
Let us focus on the overwhelming positives of migration and use facts, not prejudice, to address its challenges. -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/ljxTdwvs7Q https://t.co/6nFc2HbUvL

Nigeria has provided military and police officers to @UNPeacekeeping for 50+ years.

Thank you, Nigeria, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/wqyam6p7Oh

If you can’t reuse it, refuse it!

For #ValentinesDay this week, @UNEP asked us all to break up with single-use plastics & commit to a better common future for #CleanSeas https://t.co/KCsZtkFXh9 https://t.co/0rO1g16KOk
Friday was Children's Day at UN Headquarters! See what happened in our behind-the-scenes @Instagram story ➡️ handle: unitednations https://t.co/7dMkVGMe4q
.@UNFPA works to ensure dignity for women & girls: https://t.co/bIMmPzmgkV https://t.co/dweFmSKZdA

UN Peacekeepers come from different countries, cultures & backgrounds --
but share a common purpose to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/xVqeKcXG8j

One UN - many different languages here on @Twitter

Arabic @UNarabic
French @ONU_fr
Kiswahili @UmojaWaMataifa
Portuguese @NacoesUnidas
Russian @UnitedNationsRU
Spanish @ONU_es https://t.co/9L2bb7FA2t

3 requirements for a positive childbirth experience 🤰:

🔹 A companion of choice
🔹 Clear communication by maternity staff
🔹 Mobility in labour & birth position of choice

Find out the latest guidelines from @who: https://t.co/tm6JMQoeTs https://t.co/9JkpA3JYXG
New “Rural Women, Human Rights“ exhibit on display at UNHQ tells the stories of women & girls gaining new skills & setting up businesses. https://t.co/SZKsNyLzER #TimeIsNow https://t.co/CAiuWFuSlu
Check out our @Facebook Live with @ctbto_alerts chief @SinaZerbo who shares why he's so committed to eliminating nuclear testing ➡️ https://t.co/2nEYmaFpvx https://t.co/vbYx4vJlMk

Friday was Kids Day at UNHQ in #NYC. Young visitors explored the work of the UN through games, puzzles & quizzes. Find out about the special UN Kids Tours here: https://t.co/S5ptESSN0i https://t.co/7C2OLapHjF

UN Peacekeepers leave their families behind & put themselves at risk to help others. We thank the nearly 900 Nigerian peacekeepers who are currently #ServingForPeace for their service & sacrifice: https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ https://t.co/mRmKsmJMSl

#FlashbackFriday to January 1960: #NYC skyline with UNHQ in the foreground. Our Headquarters are in New York, but the work of the UN touches lives of people all over the 🌏. https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/hABFpjd5ka

All human beings are born free & equal in dignity & rights.

#StandUp4HumanRights & record your #RightsOutLoud: https://t.co/QVjNysX7Zp https://t.co/YTQv3pWCam

All women have a right to a positive childbirth experience.

@WHO recommends reducing the use of needless and potentially harmful clinical & medical interventions: https://t.co/tm6JMQoeTs https://t.co/4bvOLuVxK7
#TBT to 2009 when Chinese peacekeepers with @UNMILNews celebrated #LunarNewYear while #ServingForPeace. We thank them for service & sacrifice. https://t.co/I553F4pLO3 https://t.co/SYINjLh5KM
Over 1000 young people from around the 🌍 are at UNHQ in NYC for the #YouthAssembly to share their ideas💡 how to achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/9z6AHf5DYK https://t.co/TFU1ijW1QZ
#LunarNewYear: As we begin the Year of the Dog, we thank Taz & our K-9 colleagues 🐶  for keeping us safe all year round! https://t.co/dF5ektrEW1

Happy #ChineseNewYear!

Order your @unstamps for the Chinese Lunar Year of the Dog here: https://t.co/PIPVzRflHB https://t.co/rXmotkyTbd
We will not tolerate anyone committing or condoning sexual exploitation and abuse -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/G3A62cDLtG https://t.co/gBWtq5JVEg
I wish you good health, happiness and success in the Year of the Dog! -- @antonioguterres on #ChineseNewYear https://t.co/5ygJjVHN7A
#LoveIsLove: This #ValentinesDay, join @free_equal & support fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans & intersex people https://t.co/nVI4zJt1It https://t.co/N5T2qwbjS4

NYC students visited the Holocaust exhibit at UNHQ & contributed butterflies to “The Butterfly Project”, which pays tribute to 1.5M children murdered during the Holocaust: https://t.co/bLqlPh2Mne https://t.co/i0mNDIXlb5

Women are more likely than men to be:
▪️ poor
▪️ hungry
▪️ victims of violence

Gender equality is 🗝️ to achieving #GlobalGoals. Check out the new @UN_Women #PromisesToAction report ⬇️ https://t.co/kwukydUKz2

This #ValentinesDay, @UNEP asks us all to end our toxic relationship with single-use plastics & commit to a better common future for #CleanSeas https://t.co/KCsZtkompB

 https://t.co/lvbsbRX413
#ValentinesDay is a romantic time for couples, but not for these girls. Help them say #IDONT to child marriage: https://t.co/fGaEtkbbGg #ENDChildMarriage https://t.co/1KeZVBUh8Q

UN Peacekeepers from the UK work to stabilise regions in conflict and help keep us all safer. Thank you, UK, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/5oinVdbAF0

Climate change is real & it's happening now. But by taking urgent climate action we will create jobs, improve our health & save money.

Here's what you can do: https://t.co/K0aDMQXinD https://t.co/0CyICVSNFf

For 15 years the UN helped Liberians restore peace & stability to their country. Our latest podcast looks at how @UNMILNews radio brought people together 🎧 ⬇️

https://t.co/vtpqj62MS5 https://t.co/Y4oH3nfgzi
The UN does not tolerate or condone sexual exploitation nor abuse. Here is how the UN is working to make zero tolerance a reality: https://t.co/G3A62cmaC8 https://t.co/FhWMZdassr
Why not break up for #ValentinesDay? Join @UNEP & end your relationship with single-use plastics so that we can enjoy #CleanSeas https://t.co/KCsZtkFXh9 https://t.co/uuYKN0djC9

How can we tailor investments to the needs of young rural people in vulnerable situations? This and other critical questions are addressed at the @IFADnews Governing Council this week 👉 https://t.co/QpvJQ8KXyg https://t.co/F0UlGX96KX
13 February is #WorldRadioDay 📻 - a day to celebrate the power of radio & sports. Join @UNESCO’s call for more diversity in sports radio ➡️ https://t.co/Jzyp1eALWb https://t.co/5kkQZYC99s
The UN budget covers our work on peace & security, human rights, #GlobalGoals & much more https://t.co/MGT7G5uPFL https://t.co/qijExF6xhK
Radio & Sports is the theme of Tuesday's #WorldRadioDay. Get facts & figures from @UNESCO here: https://t.co/Jzyp1ejaxB https://t.co/cHLFCUge9x

These Ukrainian UN Peacekeepers are the last from their country to leave the @UNPeacekeeping mission in Liberia, which will close next month. Ukraine has been #ServingForPeace at @UNMILNews for 14+ years ⬇️
https://t.co/NcIUcqHBGU https://t.co/xu1GQ7ALEV
On #WorldRadioDay, let us celebrate both radio and sports as ways of helping people to achieve their full potential. -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/WoaWHwix3k https://t.co/bWeWyjFBew

Meet @un_women champion 'Pad Man'.

When he learnt that women had to choose between buying milk or sanitary pads, he had this revolutionary idea 💡 👉 https://t.co/vDz5gbnhbB https://t.co/ByIcxjOT6U
How much does your country contribute? The UN budget is smaller than you think. Answers to FAQs are here: https://t.co/YHjwQo4Qt6 https://t.co/kIgdRgrKpt
Children can be more than beneficiaries, they can be partners on the road to peace - new @UNUniversity #CradledByConflict study: https://t.co/qDYYVdtHHL https://t.co/1DAoVax4fB
Starting this week in @UNGeneva: Committee on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, 19th session (through 9 March): https://t.co/RzxtUunzrT https://t.co/U86rleJTpa
It may not always make the headlines, but the UN works to prevent conflicts every day. Here is how: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/XoSZN1m8bW
What's happening this week at the UN? #WorldRadioDay and much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/U76dONw7SD https://t.co/w4MFlypIcl
There’s nothing romantic about girls becoming child brides. This #ValentinesDay, help girls around the 🌍  say #IDONT to child marriage: https://t.co/fGaEtkbbGg https://t.co/oxuaJjGPeP

Every year, @WFP delivers food to more than 80 million people in need. ⬇️

https://t.co/Dg6npTOtIi

The world needs science and science needs women.

Sunday is Int'l Day of Girls & #WomenInScience https://t.co/BoOgaq62JT https://t.co/NVuzKInBYK
On his way to #PeyongChang2018, @antonioguterres met with his predecessor, Ban Ki-moon. More about his trip: https://t.co/abpbMnhAtK https://t.co/l77O4eStne

Greater diversity = better science

We all benefit from the participation of girls & #WomenInScience https://t.co/EdF1q6BoH4 https://t.co/MtUqaDENuD

Ready to go when crisis strikes: Meet 4 members of the UN int'l emergency response team who deal with disasters at a moment's notice. 🎧 ⬇️

https://t.co/400BxBriDy

“I hope I can lead by example & inspire other young Africans to also follow their dreams.”
Kenya's 1st Olympic Alpine skier Sabrina Wanjiku Simader becomes @UNEP's 1st Mountain Hero: https://t.co/aD8JQsPafL #PyeongChang2018

We need to encourage and support girls & women to achieve their full potential as scientific researchers & innovators. It’s time to support and invest in them.

--@antonioguterres on Sunday's Girls & #WomenInScience Day: https://t.co/YeKb791Jnn https://t.co/Nv8IOKjWDp

"We're here to help people who are so desperately in need."
Meet the UK's Lt Col Katie Hislop, the only woman commander at the @UNPeacekeeping mission in South Sudan. 🎧 ⬇️ https://t.co/O7bSVdBZZj

It is so important to have frank, open & medically accurate conversations about sexual and reproductive health.

-@UNFPA Goodwill Ambassador @AshleyJudd in Sri Lanka: https://t.co/JexG0wtDno https://t.co/4sEzfzqZYH
200 Nigerian UN peacekeepers left Liberia this week ahead of closure of successful @UNPeacekeeping mission: https://t.co/x1UTLdn8Bg #ServingForPeace https://t.co/wB4T2GMNPg

“The Butterfly Project”, an exhibit at UNHQ in #NYC, pays tribute to 1.5M children murdered during the Holocaust.

More on #HolocaustRemembrance: https://t.co/bLqlPhkneM https://t.co/Ze37F1IIv2

UN Peacekeepers from the UK work to stabilise regions in conflict and help keep us all safer. Thank you, UK, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/nseJoWS6YH
Governments, businesses, cities & people everywhere are taking climate action. Join them today: https://t.co/K0aDMReTMd #ParisAgreement https://t.co/n98lwMVOKx
Go behind-the-scenes with @antonioguterres at #PyeongChang2018 in our @Instagram story (handle: unitednations) https://t.co/m2lrvaNuD9
The United Kingdom provides military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping. These brave women & men are #ServingForPeace at great personal risk: https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/c6NNwgDJ2v

Let the Olympic Flame shine as a beacon to human solidarity.
Let the Olympic Truce help spread a culture of peace.
Let the Olympic Spirit guide our actions today and every day.

-- @antonioguterres at #PyeongChang2018 https://t.co/uYDZU7HYvx
Having survived Auschwitz, Eva Lavi believes it is her destiny to bear witness to the evils of the Holocaust. 🎧 to our latest podcast: https://t.co/JSuYOek57h https://t.co/m24SGszwUR
#FBF to 1990 when Namibia 1st celebrated independence. More on the UN and decolonization here: https://t.co/e31PDW2wuH https://t.co/a0hlrGqBSX

The road to achieving the #GlobalGoals runs through our towns & cities and millions travel on it every day in the hope that it will lead to a better, safer future -- @RobertGlasserUN https://t.co/7yJHlzBt9y #WUF9

I was moved to see people from different cultures, religions & different ways to see the world, all ready to compete in the Olympic spirit. We could use more of that spirit of solidarity & mutual respect all over the world -- @antonioguterres met athletes at #PyeongChang2018 https://t.co/29PojjYeHc

More than 120 countries provide military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping.

Peacekeepers serve at great personal risk & under harsh conditions to help others. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/TqfIBpSWb8

Join the conversation with the UN Humanitarian Coordinator in Myanmar @knutostby using #UN4Myanmar & follow his Twitter Chat on 15 Feb ⬇️

https://t.co/jBhWs07Eag
Thank you, @JustinTrudeau, for recognizing the Int'l Decade for People of #AfricanDescent & for helping #FightRacism. https://t.co/sqPRH9CJo8 https://t.co/J19FZMLt4B

📷: #TBT to 1961: Refugee children receive a supplementary meal from @UNRWA in Jordan. Today UNRWA provides education for 500K+ students, health services for 3.1M refugees & much more: https://t.co/64pvvom6TM https://t.co/3aLlTwloxv

When crisis strikes, the UN emergency response system is ready to go! UNDAC has been saving lives for 25 years.

https://t.co/fZh1FqaIks

Ahead of #PyeongChang2018, meet 6 women athletes who are levelling the playing field in sports ⬇️

https://t.co/qSu7aYl7oK

The fundamental message of the Olympic Truce is that our common humanity can transcend political differences -- @antonioguterres ahead of #PyeongChang2018 https://t.co/48Pw7828gS https://t.co/hUfSUDCB5Q
300+ former child soldiers have been released by armed groups in South Sudan, after efforts by @UNMISS & @UNICEF https://t.co/FULy07cb2z https://t.co/LU0LRZAPhq

.@UNHabitat's World Urban Forum, the 🌍’s premier conference on cities 🏙, kicked off on Wednesday in Kuala Lumpur. Find out more ➡️ https://t.co/F08GfQViko

https://t.co/BvqYts5TSA
Bangladesh has been providing military & police to @UNPeacekeeping for 30 years. These brave men & women are #ServingForPeace at great personal risk: https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/IsqayvfnAb

Respect for human rights is at the ❤️ of development & peace. 
Without it, we can't achieve the #GlobalGoals.
#StandUp4HumanRights: https://t.co/2ftXxLSUoQ https://t.co/RXg7LRd2l9
Since the creation of the UN, 80+ former colonies comprising 750 million people have gained independence. More on decolonization here: https://t.co/dkGYDv5b9j https://t.co/pik7q4cahn

Burundi is at risk of becoming a forgotten refugee crisis without support, warns @refugees.

https://t.co/W0v3pp0deZ
Latty is one of the brave women & girls fighting female genital mutilation. From Burkina Faso, she advocates to #EndFGM. Here's her inspiring story: https://t.co/1s4YuzkRfl https://t.co/QQ8gE4dUQM
